title: Emmy in the Café
description: Emmy loved her job. Until he showed up. Marsh's Manor is known as one of the most popular cafés in the area, run by Frederick Marsh and his children. Most of its success, however, comes from the dedication of his niece, Emmy Marsh. But Emmy Marsh's perfectly organised world turns into chaos with the arrival of Bellamy Vella, the newest employee at her family's café. His wit, charming personality and hospitality managed to win over her friends, her family and her customers. Just not her. Not completely. Still, Emmy's not the only one with problems...Her friends have problems of their own.A story about the lives of a young woman and her group of friends, as they deal with friendships, family and love.
author: Kimberley Young
